Detailed Description

Provides the glue to show AppWidget widgets. 

 // Using AppWidgetHost to create an AppWidgetHostWidget.

 // Define your AppWidgetHost ID before create an AppWidgetHost instance.
 int32_t mHostID = 1111;

 //Create an AppWidgetHost instance on your AP.
 AppWidgetHost* mpHost = new AppWidgetHost(this, mHostID);

 // Create AppWidgetManager to get all install AppWidgetProviderInfo
 AppWidgetManaget* mpManager = new AppWidgetManager(this);
 Vector<AppWidgetProviderInfo*> instanllObject;
 instanllObject = mpManager->getInstalledProvidersN(AppWidgetProviderInfo::PROVIDER_TYPE_HOME);

 //Get a AppWidgetId for an AppWidget that will be added.
 int32_t mAppWidgetId = mpHost->allocateAppWidgetId()
 //Bind AppWidgetId with corresponding AppWidgetProviderInfo.
 AppWidgetProviderInfo* info = instanllObject.itemAt(i);
 mpManager->bindAppWidgetId(mAppWidgetId, info->getProvider());

 // Create AppWidgetHostWidget with corresponding AppWidgetProviderInfo, and you can add it to WidgetController to display.
 AppWidgetHostWidget* widget = mpHost->createWidgetN(this, mAppWidgetId, info);

You could refer to the development page for AppWidget details: COS Cplusplus Development/Developer Guides/AppWidget

Member Function Documentation

static graphics::Rect* gaia::core::AppWidgetHostWidget::getDefaultPaddingForWidgetN ( const Page *  page,
const ComponentName *  componentName,
const graphics::Rect *  padding 
) [static]

We are automatically adding padding to widgets.

This method is only needed by developers of AppWidgetHosts. The method is provided in order for the AppWidgetHost to account for the automatic padding when computing the number of cells to allocate to a particular widget.

Parameters:
pagethe current page
componentNamethe component name of the widget
paddingRect in which to place the output, if null, a new Rect will be allocated and returned
Returns:
default padding for this widget
